snippet: Brian Cashman and Theo Epstein could never make trades between their clubs when they ran the Yankees and the Red Sox. With Epstein in Chicago, that may change.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that Chicago Cubs new general manager Theo Epstein is finally free to negotiate trades with New York Yankees GM Brian Cashman, now that Epstein is no longer with archrival Boston Red Sox.
lead_paragraph: Brian Cashman and Theo Epstein could never make trades between their clubs when they ran the Yankees and the Red Sox. With Epstein in Chicago, that may change.

headline.seo: Cashman and Epstein Recall the Recent Yankees-Red Sox Past
headline.main: Now They Can Deal With Each Other, and Give Each Other Credit
headline.print_headline: Old Adversaries May Be Ready to Deal
